TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit VisualStateManager extends System.Windows.DependencyObject

summary.span: 管理控制項在狀態之間轉換的狀態與邏輯。

span.span: Manages states and the logic for transitioning between states for controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您指定控制項的外觀，控制項的狀態，當處於特定狀態，而且控制項變更狀態。The enables you to specify states for a control, the appearance of a control when it is in a certain state, and when a control changes states. 比方說，未按下時，於按下時，可能有稍微不同的外觀。For example, a might have a slightly different appearance when it is pressed than when it is not pressed. 兩個指出定義按下時，對應到 (`"Pressed"`) 並不是 (`"Normal"`)。Two states that the defines correspond to when it is pressed (`"Pressed"`) and when it is not (`"Normal"`). 當處於狀態控制項的外觀由定義。The appearance of a control when it is in a state is defined by a . A包含的集合指定控制項的外觀如何變更當控制項處於該狀態的物件。A contains a collection of objects that specify how the control's appearance changes when the control is in that state. 藉由設定控制項新增視覺狀態`VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups`附加在控制項上的屬性。You add visual states to a control by setting the `VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups` attached property on the control. 每個包含的集合互斥的物件。Each contains a collection of objects that are mutually exclusive. 也就是說，此控制項一律會在每一個狀態的。That is, the control is always in exactly one state of in each . 也可讓您指定當控制項進入特定狀態時。The also enables you to specify when a control enters a specific state. 若要變更狀態，您應該呼叫的方法取決於您的案例。The method that you should call to change states depends on your scenario. 如果您建立使用的控制項在其，呼叫方法。If you create a control that uses the in its , call the method. 如需有關如何建立可控制使用，請參閱 < [ 建立具有可自訂外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md)。For more information about how to create controls that use the , see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md). 如果您使用之外(例如，如果您使用中或單一項目中)，呼叫方法。If you use the outside of a (for example, if you use a in a or in a single element), call the method. 在任一情況下，執行，才能適當地啟動及停止與相關的狀態相關聯的分鏡腳本的邏輯。In either case, the performs the logic that is required to appropriately start and stop the storyboards that are associated with the involved state. 例如，假設控制項定義狀態，`State1`和`State2`，每個都有與其相關聯的分鏡腳本。For example, suppose that a control defines the states, `State1` and `State2`, each of which has a storyboard associated with it. 如果控制項處於`State1`，您傳遞`State2`來或，則中啟動分鏡腳本`State2`並停止在分鏡腳本`State1`。If the control is in `State1` and you pass `State2` to or , the starts the storyboard in `State2` and stops the storyboard in `State1`. 所包含的控制項[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]使用變更視覺狀態。Controls that are included with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] use the to change visual states. 當您建立隨附的控制項[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，您可以新增物件來控制處於特定狀態指定控制項的外觀。When you create a for a control that is included with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], you can add objects to the control's to specify the control's appearance in a certain state. 若要尋找的視覺狀態名稱所包含的控制項[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]，請參閱 < [ 控制項的樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md)。To find the names of the visual states for the controls that are included with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], see [Control Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md). 定義控制項的邏輯控制代碼，因此您不需要採取任何動作以外的狀態之間轉換在新的物件。The control's logic handles transitioning between states, so you do not need to do anything other than define the objects in the new . 如需如何建立現有控制項的控制項範本的詳細資訊，請參閱[透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about how to create control templates for existing controls, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 如果您想要實作您自己的邏輯狀態之間轉換時，您必須繼承自，覆寫方法，並設定附加屬性使用的自訂邏輯的控制項上。If you want to implement your own logic for transitioning between states, you must inherit from , override the method, and set the attached property on the control that uses the custom logic. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，並將名為`CommonStates`到`VisualStateManager.VisualStatesGroups`附加屬性。The following example creates a and adds a named `CommonStates` to the `VisualStateManager.VisualStatesGroups` attached property. 此範例會定義`MouseOver`並`Normal`中的物件`CommonStates` 。The example defines the `MouseOver` and `Normal` objects in the `CommonStates`. 當使用者把滑鼠指標移動過，它從變成紅色綠色移轉一個半秒。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the , it changes from red to green over one half second. 當使用者移動滑鼠離開矩形，立即變更回為紅色。When the user moves the mouse away from the rectangle, the immediately changes back to red. 請注意，`Normal`狀態不會定義。Note that the `Normal` state does not define a . A由於不需要時從轉換`MouseOver`狀態`Normal`狀態，如`MouseOver`停止和屬性傳回為紅色。A is not required because when the transitions from the `MouseOver` state to the `Normal` state, the for `MouseOver` is stopped and the property for the returns to red. [!code-xaml[VSMCustomControl#VSMNoTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/csharp/window1.xaml#vsmnotemplate)] 下列範例示範呼叫與上述範例中所定義的事件處理常式狀態之間轉換的方法。The following example shows the event handler that is defined in the previous example and calls the method to transition between states. 在上述範例中的矩形是否屬於，範例會具有呼叫方法。If the rectangle in the previous example was part of a , the example would have to call the method. [!code-csharp[VSMCustomControl#GoToElementState](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#gotoelementstate)] [!code-vb[VSMCustomControl#GoToElementState](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmcustomcontrol/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#gotoelementstate)]

span.span: Gets or sets the object that transitions between the states of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已`null`，則狀態之間會使用自己的邏輯轉換。If is `null`, the uses its own logic to transition between states. 如果您想要實作您自己的邏輯狀態之間轉換，建立類別繼承自，並覆寫方法。If you want to implement your own logic for transitioning between states, create a class that inherits from and override the method. 若要使用自訂類別，將屬性，以您的自訂類型的物件。To use the custom class, set the property to an object of your custom type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫狀態以外的項目上的方法，以變更(例如，如果您使用中或)。Call the method to change states on an element outside of a (for example, if you use a in a or ). 呼叫方法，如果您要變更使用的控制項中的狀態在其。Call the method if you are changing states in a control that uses the in its . ## Examples 下列範例會建立應用程式會提示使用者猜測的數字，介於 1 到 100 之間。The following example creates an application that prompts the user to guess a number between 1 and 100. 當使用者輸入數字時，應用程式會指出先前的猜測是否過高、 太低，或正確。When the user enters a number, the application indicates whether the guess is too high, too low, or correct. 下列[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]會建立應用程式的使用者介面，並定義 4 個狀態： `TooLow`， `TooHigh`， `Correct`，和`Guessing`。The following [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] creates the user interface for the application and defines 4 states: `TooLow`, `TooHigh`, `Correct`, and `Guessing`. 當應用程式開始時，就在`Guessing`狀態。When the application begins, it is in the `Guessing` state. 。. [!code-xaml[VSMGoToElementState#GoToElementStateXaml](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmgotoelementstate/csharp/mainwindow.xaml#gotoelementstatexaml)] 下列程式碼會顯示應用程式邏輯。The following code shows the logic of the application. 當使用者輸入數字，並按一下按鈕時，應用程式會呼叫轉為`TooHigh`， `TooLow`，或`Correct`提供回饋給使用者的猜測。When the user enters a number and clicks the button, the application calls to transition to `TooHigh`, `TooLow`, or `Correct` to provide feedback to the user about the guess. 若要試用此範例中，呼叫`GenerateNumber`應用程式開始時的方法。To try this example, call the `GenerateNumber` method when the application begins. [!code-csharp[VSMGoToElementState#GoToElementStateCode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmgotoelementstate/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#gotoelementstatecode)] [!code-vb[VSMGoToElementState#GoToElementStateCode](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmgotoelementstate/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#gotoelementstatecode)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法所執行的邏輯，適當地啟動及停止與轉換相關聯的分鏡腳本。The method performs the logic necessary to appropriately start and stop the storyboards that are associated with a transition. 當控制項便會呼叫若要變更其狀態，會進行下列作業：When a control calls to change its state, the does the following: - 首先，如果控制項正在轉換至已，分鏡腳本開始。First, if the that the control is transitioning to has a , the storyboard begins. 然後，如果控制項來自具有，分鏡腳本結束。Then, if the that the control is coming from has a , the storyboard ends. - 如果控制項已在`stateName`狀態，會採取任何動作，並傳回`true`。If the control is already in the `stateName` state, takes no action and returns `true`. - 如果`stateName`不存在於的`control`，會採取任何動作，並傳回`false`。If `stateName` does not exist in the of `control`, takes no action and returns `false`. 您也可以實作自己提供不同的邏輯狀態之間轉換。You can implement your own to provide different logic for transitioning between states. 比方說，您可以變更先前所述的邏輯，或者您可以提供自訂動畫類型之間轉換的邏輯。For example, you can change the logic described previously, or you can provide logic to transition between custom animation types. 若要實作，建立類別繼承自，並覆寫方法。To implement a , create a class that inherits from and override the method. 若要使用自訂類別，將屬性，以您的自訂類型的物件。To use the custom class, set the property to an object of your custom type.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.
